title: Fragment, 1921-22-41, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) on satin ground
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of deep purple cut and uncut velvet on self-colored satin ground. Design of large-scale branches with leaf and blossom. One horizontal row of design remains with branches curving to the left.
